text: Pablo Baeza (born 11 November 1988) is a Chilean handball player for BM Usab and the Chilean national team. He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean male handball players Category:South American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:South American Games medalists in handball Category:Competitors at the 2018 South American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in handball Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Chile Category:Handball players at the 2007 Pan American Games Category:Handball players at the 2015 Pan American Games
title: Pablo Baeza
